item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会面临裁员和动荡，而其监管的加密货币却蓬勃发展
item.description:
商品期货交易委员会准备承担新的巨大责任。工作人员描述了混乱、削减以及怨恨和偏执的气氛。【原文：

The Commodity Futures Trading Commission is poised to take on vast new responsibilities. Staff describe chaos, cutbacks and an atmosphere of resentment and paranoia.

】

item.title: 纽约市哈德逊院子办公楼以超过 50% 的折扣出售
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，曼哈顿哈德逊码附近的一座 18 层办公楼以较 2018 年购买价大幅打折的价格售出。【原文：An 18-story office tower near Manhattan’s Hudson Yards sold at a significant discount to its 2018 purchase price, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇任命长期盟友尼古拉斯-格劳为财政部长
item.description: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇（Gabriel Boric）周四任命尼古拉斯-格劳（Nicolas Grau）为智利新任财政部长，在其内阁中对市场最友好的成员辞职后，他选择了一位长期的左派盟友来填补空缺。【原文：Chile President Gabriel Boric named Nicolas Grau as the nation’s new finance minister on Thursday, tapping a longtime leftist ally to fill the void after his cabinet’s most market-friendly member quit.】

item.title: 购物者青睐特价商品，罗斯百货销售业绩喜人
item.description: 折扣零售商罗斯百货公司（Ross Stores Inc.【原文：Discount-retailer Ross Stores Inc. jumped after projecting inflation will push more consumers to seek its off-price wares and deliver sales growth above expectations.】

item.title: Zoom 预计销售额将增长，这是新人工智能工具的积极信号
item.description: Zoom Communications Inc. 公布的年度销售增长前景强于预期，并上调了本财年的业绩预期，这表明客户正在购买更多该公司扩大的软件产品系列。【原文：Zoom Communications Inc. gave a stronger-than-expected annual outlook for sales growth, and raised its fiscal-year forecast, suggesting customers are buying more of the company’s expanded line of software products.】

item.title: 普尔特称库克指控是广泛打击抵押贷款欺诈的一部分
item.description: 联邦住房金融局局长比尔-普尔特（Bill Pulte）周四暗示，他以涉嫌抵押贷款欺诈为由将美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）移送司法机关是更广泛打击抵押贷款欺诈行为的一部分。【原文：Federal Housing Finance Agency Director Bill Pulte suggested Thursday that his referral of Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook for alleged mortgage fraud was part of a broader crackdown on the issue.】

item.title: 安德森-霍洛维茨聘用前拜登网络官员纽伯格
item.description: 拜登白宫前网络安全高级官员安妮-纽伯格（Anne Neuberger）周四宣布，她将加入风险投资公司安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）担任高级顾问。【原文：Anne Neuberger, formerly a senior cybersecurity official in the Biden White House, is joining the venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz as a senior adviser, the firm announced on Thursday.】

item.title: OpenAI 的奥特曼通过推动投资提高人工智能泡沫的风险
item.description: OpenAI 的两位高管正在谈论潜在的人工智能泡沫风险，同时打赌这家 ChatGPT 制造商已经做好了应对泡沫的准备。但首先...【原文：Two of OpenAI’s top executives are talking about the risks of a potential AI bubble while betting that the ChatGPT maker is well-positioned to weather it. But first…】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席任命武装部队法官领导执法部门
item.description: 玛格丽特-"梅格"-瑞安（Margaret "Meg" Ryan）将领导美国证券交易委员会的执法部门，这位曾为最高法院大法官克拉伦斯-托马斯（Clarence Thomas）做过书记员的军事法官将负责监管华尔街的机构。【原文：Margaret “Meg” Ryan will lead the US Securities and Exchange Commission’s enforcement division, putting a military judge who once clerked for Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas in charge of the agency that polices Wall Street.】

item.title: 华平投资创纪录，退出金额达 100 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，华平今年已为投资者带来近 100 亿美元的回流资金，仅在前六个月就创下了整个公司的变现纪录。【原文：Warburg Pincus has generated almost $10 billion in returned capital for investors this year, people familiar with the matter said, having set a firm-wide record for realizations in the first six months alone.】

item.title: 美国军方几十年来首次寻求储备钴
item.description: 美国国防部数十年来首次寻求为其战略储备购买钴，这是加强国内关键金属供应的最新举措。【原文：The US Defense Department is seeking to buy cobalt for its strategic stockpiles for the first time in decades, the latest move to bolster domestic supplies of critical metals.】

item.title: 美国 7 月购房者取消签约率创历史新高
item.description: 由于购房者情绪低落，7 月份美国的购房合同取消率创下历史新高。【原文：Home-purchase contracts in the US were canceled at a record rate for July as jittery buyers got cold feet.】

item.title: 人工智能数据中心初创企业克鲁索正在洽谈 100 亿美元估值事宜
item.description:
该公司将在这笔交易中筹集 10 亿美元的股权和债务。【原文：

The company is set to raise $1 billion in equity and debt in the deal.

】

item.title: 华尔街在财报发布前竞相上调英伟达目标价
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）8月27日发布季度财报之前，华尔街众多分析师纷纷上调了对该公司股票的预期。【原文：A slew of Wall Street analysts covering Nvidia Corp. are boosting their expectations for the chipmaker’s stock ahead of its quarterly earnings release due Aug. 27.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会称，GTCR 收购 Surmodics 将损害医疗器械市场
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）在阻止该交易的庭审开始时表示，一家私募股权公司欲将两家最大的医疗器械涂层制造商合并，这将损害救生技术的竞争。【原文：A private equity firm’s bid to combine the two biggest makers of medical-device coatings would harm competition for life-saving technologies, the Federal Trade Commission said at the start of a trial to block the deal.】

item.title: 美国谷物供应需求超预期，谷物价格上涨
item.description: 芝加哥玉米和大豆期货上涨，原因是出口需求强于预期，盖过了单产提高的预测。【原文：Corn and soybean futures rose in Chicago as stronger-than-expected demand for exports overshadowed forecasts for higher yields.】

item.title: 受股票和基础设施推动，Omers 上半年上涨 2.2
item.description: 由于基础设施、股票和信贷投资的收益抵消了美元疲软的影响，安大略市政雇员退休系统上半年的回报率达到 2.2%。【原文：Ontario Municipal Employees Retirement System returned 2.2% in the first half of the year as gains from investments in infrastructure, stocks and credit more than offset the impact of the weak US dollar.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔不确定性的三个轴心
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Anthropic 正在洽谈筹集高达 100 亿美元的新资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Anthropic 公司即将达成新一轮高达 100 亿美元的融资协议，这一融资额高于预期，也是迄今为止人工智能初创公司最大的一笔融资。【原文：Anthropic is nearing a deal to raise as much as $10 billion in a new round of funding, according to people familiar with the matter, a higher than expected sum and one of the largest megarounds to date for an artificial intelligence startup.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所最新场馆抢占德克萨斯证券交易所先机
item.description: 纽约证券交易所已经说服了一大批德克萨斯州的上市公司将其股票在其位于本州的新前哨进行双重上市，从而在竞争对手德克萨斯证券交易所计划于明年推出之前巩固了其竞争地位。【原文：The New York Stock Exchange has already convinced a significant chunk of Texas public companies to dual-list their shares on its new outpost in their home state, shoring up its competitive position ahead of next year’s planned launch of the rival Texas Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 高盛举债 60 亿美元支持 Dayforce 收购案
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. committed a $6 billion debt financing package to support Thoma Bravo’s acquisition of human resources software provider Dayforce Inc., according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行的马丁称信贷需求转向以瑞士为重点的银行
item.description: 瑞士国家银行副总裁安托万-马丁（Antoine Martin）表示，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）收购瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）引发了瑞士信贷市场的转变，推动了对国内银行的需求。【原文：The takeover of Credit Suisse by UBS Group AG has triggered a shift in the Swiss credit market, driving demand to domestically oriented banks, according to Swiss National Bank Vice President Antoine Martin.】

item.title: 评级下调后，Vanguard 引领哥伦比亚债券销售创纪录
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司之一先锋集团（Vanguard）管理的投资基金在哥伦比亚地方债券被降级为垃圾级后，引领了海外投资者在 7 月份创纪录地抛售这些债券。【原文：Investment funds managed by Vanguard, one of the world’s largest asset managers, led a record selloff of Colombian local bonds by offshore investors in July, after the notes were downgraded to junk.】

item.title: 墨西哥银行 8 月降息的原因是就业市场疲软和比索走强
item.description: 墨西哥央行以经济增长疲软、就业市场不景气和比索走强为由，决定在本月延长降息期限。【原文：Mexico’s central bank cited weak economic growth, a slack jobs market and a stronger peso in its decision to extend interest rates cuts this month.】

item.title: 私人信贷市场违约警告开始增多
item.description: 在 1.7 万亿美元的私人信贷市场上，违约警告开始堆积如山，促使至少一些分析师对华尔街最喜欢的赚钱工具之一存在的未被充分重视的风险表示担忧。【原文：Warnings on defaults are starting to pile up in the $1.7 trillion private credit market, prompting at least some analysts to raise concern about underappreciated risks in one of Wall Street’s favorite money spinners.】

item.title: 美国银行称自动驾驶汽车可提升保险公司盈利能力
item.description: 向自动驾驶汽车的转变对汽车保险业来说是一个巨大的未知数，但对美国银行公司的分析师来说，这将是一个潜在的金矿。【原文：The shift to autonomous vehicles represents a great unknown for the auto insurance industry, but to analysts at Bank of America Corp. it will be a potential goldmine.】

item.title: 通利在老奶奶基金获得 20 亿美元收益后准备推出两只新 ETF
item.description: 资产管理公司兼网络财经名人汤姆-李（Tom Lee）在其首款产品大受散户投资者欢迎并吸引了超过 20 亿美元的资产后，已申请推出两款新的交易所交易基金。【原文：Asset manager and online financial personality Tom Lee has filed to launch two new exchange-traded funds after his first product proved a smash hit with retail investors and pulled in more than $2 billion in assets.】

item.title: 饼干桶因标志引发类似百威啤酒的反弹而下挫
item.description: 周四，随着社交媒体上保守派对连锁餐厅更换标识的反弹加剧，Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Inc.【原文：The slide in Cracker Barrel Old Country Store Inc.’s shares deepened on Thursday as a conservative backlash to the restaurant chain’s logo change intensified across social media.】

item.title: 经济自给自足是神话吗？
item.description:
记者兼作家朱棣文（Ben Chu）在《特朗普经济学》（Trumponomics）一书中解释了为什么各经济体，尤其是美国不应该认为全球化是理所当然的。【原文：

On Trumponomics, journalist and author Ben Chu explains why economies—and particularly the US—shouldn’t take globalization for granted.

】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰希望以 15 亿美元出售 HPS、Clearlake 和 Golub 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Blue Owl Capital Inc. 预计将通过出售私人资产管理公司的少数股权组合筹集约 15 亿美元资金。【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. is expected to raise about $1.5 billion through the sale of a portfolio of minority stakes in private asset managers, according to people familiar with the matter.】
